value.value: 毛包欠如
missing epidermal invaginations from which the hair shaft develops
毛包数の減少
fewer number of the epidermal invaginations from which the hair shaft develops
毛包の矮小化
reduced size of the invagination of the epidermis from which the hair shaft develops
毛包の巨大化
increased size of the epidermal invaginations from which the hair shaft develops
毛包の分化停止/遅延
arrest of or retarded differentiation of the epidermal invaginations from which the hair shaft develops
毛包の配向異常
misaligned hair follicles; hair follicles that do not orient in a typical pattern
毛包パターンの歪み
twisted or contorted configuration of the arrangement of hair follicles in the skin
乱れた内毛根鞘細胞
disorganization of the epithelial cells that resides in the inner root sheath of the hair follicle

label.value: absent hair follicle inner root sheath

value.value: 毛包内根鞘の欠如

https://w3id.org/babelon/source_value.value: absent hair follicle inner root sheath

value.value: absence of the multilayered tube composed of terminally differentiated hair follicle keratinocytes that is surrounded by the outer root sheath; the layers of the inner root sheath include the companion layer, Henle's layer, Huxley's layer and the inner root sheath cuticle
外毛根鞘細胞の乱れ
disordered enveloping layer of cells of the hair follicle; surrounds inner root and is continuous with basal and spinous layers of the epidermis
毛母細胞の乱れ
disordered layer of matrix cells of the hair follicle
毛包の早期発生
early onset of hair follicle development
毛包退行促進
earlier onset of catagen phase during the cyclic transformation of the hair follicle
毛包形成の持続性
continuous induction of de novo hair follicles in the epidermis
毛包のメラニン顆粒欠如
absence of the pigment polymers located in the hair follicles
毛の屈曲増大
greater bending arch of the distinct C- or S- shaped curvature of the hairs
粗毛の異常
any structural anomaly of the long, straight truncal hairs that contain two air cells in the medulla
粗毛の分裂
intercellular splits and kinks within or along the hair shaft of the long, straight truncal hairs that contain two air cells in the medulla
粗毛の屈曲増大
greater bending arch of the guard hairs
awl毛の異常
any structural anomaly of truncal hairs that are straight, but are shorter than guard hairs, and contain two or more air cells in the medulla
awl毛の屈曲増大
greater bending arch of the awl hairs
ジグザグ毛の異常
any structural anomaly or amount of the truncal hairs that have two or more sharp bends with diameter constrictions at the bends, and contain one air cell in the medulla
ジグザグ毛の屈曲増大
greater bending arch of the zigzag hairs
ジグザグ毛の屈曲減少
smaller bending arch of the zigzag hairs
auchene毛の異常
any structural anomaly of truncal hairs having a single constriction and bend about midway along the hair shaft, and contain two or more air cells in the medulla
auchene毛の屈曲増大
greater bending arch of the auchene hairs
duvet毛の異常
any structural anomaly of the fine under hair of the coat
duvet毛の欠如
absence of the of the fine under hair of the coat
うねった毛
hair or fur having undulations or a sinusoidal shape
つやのある毛皮
fur with a glossy or glistening appearance
過剰な毛
greater amount of body hair compared to controls
指骨過剰
increased number of phalanges in any of the digits
脱毛症
absence of hair due to loss of hair; not in reference to primary genetic hairlessness but may be due to dietary, stress or secondary to immune condition
低密度な毛
body hair that is less dense; may be due to reduced follicle numbers or due to the inability to retain some of the hairs of the coat over time
毛の短縮
reduced average length of the hairs
斑状の毛

focal absence of hair in areas where hair is normally expected; in rodents, often appearing behind the ears and on the tail, resulting in visible patches of skin and uneven spots of hair growth on the body
ひだ状の毛
fuzzy, irregular appearance of the hair
まだらのコート
coat has spots, streaks, and/or blotches of a different color
発毛遅延
late onset of the first appearance of the fur
毛の再生遅延
slow initiation and asynchrony of the hair growth cycle (anagen) after catagen phase
毛の生育遅延
slow growth of the hair, appears at normal time
睫毛の脱落
inability to retain the eyelashes
異所的な発毛
positional abnormality of hair
発毛サイクルの異常
aberrant timing of growth and regression of the hair follicles
頭蓋顔面の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the face or head affecting appearance
上顎棚の欠如
missing bony projection of the maxilla that normally fuses with palatine shelf to form secondary (hard) palate
口蓋骨水平板サイズの欠如
missing bony plate of the palatine bone that normally fuses with maxillary shelf to form secondary (hard) palate
頭部の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the portion of the body containing the brain and organs of sight, hearing, taste, and smell
小頭症
an abnormally small head
巨頭症
an abnormally large size of the head
